name: Foxy Rewind
description:
Foxy Rewind:

You play as an explorer, looking for time piece fragments in a dungeon. As you collect the pieces, you may realise that the explosion from the time pieces causes you to rewind back to the start, so make sure you are careful with the path that you take, or the traps will get you.

This is a first time in a long time that I've used Unity and also the first time I've joined in an online game jam! Hope you all like the game.
